move_details.name: menacing-moonraze-maelstrom
move_details.effect_description: Inflicts regular damage.  Other Pokémon’s abilities cannot activate in response to this move.  In particular, it hits through disguise
move_details.flavor_text: After obtaining Z-Power, the user, Lunala, attacks the target with full force. This move can ignore the effect of the target’s Ability.
